snippet: Goalie Jonas Hiller was flawless as the Ducks defeated Detroit in Game 3, and Toronto evened its first-round Eastern Conference series with host Boston at one game each.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Anaheim Ducks defeat Detroit Red Wings, 4-0, giving them 2-1 lead in first round playoff series; Toronto Maple Leafs beat Boston Bruins, 4-2, to even first-round series at one game each.
lead_paragraph: Goalie Jonas Hiller was flawless as the Ducks defeated Detroit in Game 3, and Toronto evened its first-round Eastern Conference series with host Boston at one game each.

headline.seo: Ducks and Maple Leafs Win on the Road
headline.main: Ducks and Maple Leafs Win on the Road
headline.print_headline: Ducks and Maple Leafs Win on the Road
